in_ports.name: input
in_ports.caption: optional input
in_ports.hint: If specified, this function simply returns a copy of this array (other arguments are ignored).

out_ports.name: output
out_ports.hint: Range (2 numbers), rectangle (4 numbers) or parallelepiped (6 numbers).

out_ports.name: size_x
out_ports.hint: X-size of created rectangular area (see also "sizeX" parameter).

out_ports.name: size_y
out_ports.hint: Y-size of created rectangular area (see also "sizeY" parameter).

out_ports.name: size_z
out_ports.hint: Z-size of created rectangular area (see also "sizeZ" parameter).

controls.name: sizeX
controls.description: If specified, the previous parameter is ignored; maxX = minX+sizeX−1 for integer result or minX+sizeX for double result.

controls.name: minY
controls.description: If not specified, the result will be a range minX..maxX (1-dimensional).

controls.name: sizeY
controls.description: If specified, the previous parameter is ignored; maxY = minY+sizeY−1 for integer result or minY+sizeY for double result.

controls.name: minZ
controls.description: If not specified, the result will be a rectangle (2-dimensional).

controls.name: sizeZ
controls.description: If specified, the previous parameter is ignored; maxZ = minZ+sizeZ−1 for integer result or minZ+sizeZ for double result.
